metadata.title: CVE-2024-26679 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:inet: read sk->sk_family once in inet_recv_error()inet_recv_error() is called without holding the socket lock.IPv6 socket could mutate to IPv4 with IPV6_ADDRFORMsocket option and trigger a KCSAN warning.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
